titles.title: Great is the Lord, and greatly to be praised

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Great is the Lord and greatly to be praised.
In the city of our God,
In the mountain of His Holiness.
Beautiful for situation, joy of the whole earth.
Is Mount Zion, on the sides of the north,
The city of the great King.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Grande es Jehova y digno de ser alabado.
En la ciudad de nuestro Dios, en su monte santo.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Hermosa provincia, el gozo de toda la tierra.
